properties.name: deepgram.api.key
properties.description: Deepgram API key for Speech-to-Text service

properties.name: openai.api.key
properties.description: OpenAI API key for GPT-4o-mini and TTS services

properties.name: groq.api.key
properties.description: Groq API key for ultra-fast LLM inference (FREE at console.groq.com)

properties.name: groq.model.name
properties.description: Groq model: llama-3.3-70b-versatile (best), llama-3.1-8b-instant (fastest), mixtral-8x7b-32768

properties.name: groq.temperature
properties.description: Groq LLM temperature (0.0-1.0, lower = more deterministic)

properties.name: groq.max-tokens
properties.description: Maximum tokens in Groq response

properties.name: chroma.host
properties.description: ChromaDB server host

properties.name: chroma.port
properties.description: ChromaDB server port

properties.name: chroma.collection
properties.description: ChromaDB collection name for hospital embeddings

properties.name: vector.search.enabled
properties.description: Enable ChromaDB vector similarity search. When false, falls back to keyword matching.

properties.name: csv.mapping.file-path
properties.description: Path to the hospital CSV file

properties.name: csv.mapping.name-column
properties.description: CSV column name for hospital name

properties.name: csv.mapping.city-column
properties.description: CSV column name for city

properties.name: csv.mapping.address-column
properties.description: CSV column name for address

properties.name: csv.mapping.state-column
properties.description: CSV column name for state

properties.name: csv.mapping.phone-column
properties.description: CSV column name for phone number

properties.name: csv.mapping.specialties-column
properties.description: CSV column name for specialties

properties.name: csv.mapping.type-column
properties.description: CSV column name for network type

properties.name: csv.mapping.pincode-column
properties.description: CSV column name for pincode

properties.name: elevenlabs.api.key
properties.description: ElevenLabs API key for ultra-fast TTS (get from elevenlabs.io)

properties.name: elevenlabs.voice.id
properties.description: ElevenLabs voice ID (Rachel=21m00Tcm4TlvDq8ikWAM, Adam=pNInz6obpgDQGcFmaJgB)

properties.name: tts.voice
properties.description: OpenAI TTS voice fallback (alloy, echo, fable, onyx, nova, shimmer)

properties.name: tts.intro.message
properties.description: Introduction message spoken by Loop AI
properties.defaultValue: Hi, this is Loop AI. How can I assist you today?

properties.name: twilio.account.sid
properties.description: Twilio Account SID for SMS/Voice API

properties.name: twilio.auth.token
properties.description: Twilio Auth Token for SMS/Voice API

properties.name: twilio.phone.number
properties.description: Twilio phone number (sender) for SMS/Voice

properties.name: twilio.human.agent.number
properties.description: Human agent phone number to receive forwarded calls/SMS

properties.name: twilio.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable Twilio integration
